review.author: Architect
review.findings: Session 106 backlog sprint — 8 items reviewed. (1) WEBP MIME: detectImageExt magic bytes correct, gallery dedup logic sound, fd-based header read efficient. (2) Color bleed: height:1 + layer:top + reset decoration pattern correct. (3) App icon: platform branching correct, path resolution verified. (4) MutationObserver tests: callback pattern matches renderer.js wiring. (5) DevOps: war-room sanitization, dual-writer consolidation, IPC unregister coverage — all verified. All 105 suites, 3218 tests passing.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
